title: Create 3D Model of a Site
description: A surveyor has captured point cloud data of an existing facility. A designer needs to convert this into a 3D CAD model.

tasks.description: Import the surveyor's point cloud data into the 3D modeling software.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully loads the point cloud data.

tasks.description: Use the software's tools to identify and model major structural and equipment elements from the point cloud.
tasks.expected_outcome: The designer models the main beams, columns, and vessels based on the point cloud.

tasks.description: Export the resulting 3D model for use in new design work.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully creates and exports a 3D model of the existing conditions.
